game

Class InvisibleBridge

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.OriginalBridge
      • game.InvisibleBridge

  • public class InvisibleBridge
extends OriginalBridge
    Represents a straight, invisible bridge. It is vertically built by the player when the space button is pressed and is invisible. The bridge shows up when it horizontally falls to connect the Person to the adjacent Isle
    Version:
    5/15
    Author:
    Samantha Sung

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      InvisibleBridge(double start)
      Initializes the starting x-coordinate, length, angle, and movement variables of the bridge

      Draws the bridge.

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet surface)
        Draws the bridge. This will only happen after the player has stopped pressing Space.
        Overrides:
